name: Thokk
response: Thokk, the mossy eminence of Midgard’s damp underbelly, views insurance about as highly as one might view a particularly smelly rock—tolerated only because the effort to chuck it into the lava would be too much. Pharma, however, is Thokk’s true religion—he worships it with a grimy passion, imagining himself as some kind of fungal prophet scribbling cryptic moss poems on damp stones. But deep down, his heart belongs to crypto—a digital treasure he’d probably follow into the void if it meant mining gold coins in the afterlife. Thokk’s devotion is as reliable as a slow drip from a leaky ceiling, except instead of water, it’s all about the blockchain!
